title: (x) "Yasmin's" rounded geometric sans/"Macaroni" ornate serif - Frankfurter/Victorian {Dav/Mike Y, Tiff}
content:
Hi There,

Could someone give a hand identifying these fonts?

thks ;)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [yasmins.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823004937/http:/typophile.com/files/yasmins.jpg) | 67.87 KB |
| [macaroni.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823004937/http:/typophile.com/files/macaroni.jpg) | 43.69 KB |
author: haag

comments.content: Yasmin’s looks like a mix between VAG Rounded and Helvetica Rounded.
Think Yasmin is a font called hotdog or balloon.

Too close. 'Frankfurter', that is. :)  
_( Which of course IS the sausage in a Hot Dog. :)_

[Dav](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823004937/http:/www.dav.name/)

AHAH. I knew it. I went looking because I knew I had to be wrong.

[Frankfurter Highlight](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823004937/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/frankfurter/highlight/)
The other one is [Victorian](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823004937/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/victorian/) from Linotype.
